property.name: Flags
property.tp:docstring: Flags describing the capabilities of the access point.

property.name: WpaFlags
property.tp:docstring: Flags describing the access point's capabilities according to WPA (Wifi Protected Access).

property.name: RsnFlags
property.tp:docstring: Flags describing the access point's capabilities according to the RSN (Robust Secure Network) protocol.

property.name: Ssid
property.tp:docstring: The Service Set Identifier identifying the access point.

property.name: Frequency
property.tp:docstring: The radio channel frequency in use by the access point, in MHz.

property.name: HwAddress
property.tp:docstring: The hardware address (BSSID) of the access point.

property.name: Mode
property.tp:docstring: Describes the operating mode of the access point.

property.name: MaxBitrate
property.tp:docstring: The maximum bitrate this access point is capable of, in kilobits/second (Kb/s).

property.name: Strength
property.tp:docstring: The current signal quality of the access point, in percent.

property.name: LastSeen
property.tp:docstring: The timestamp (in CLOCK_BOOTTIME seconds) for the last time the access point was found in scan results. A value of -1 means the access point has never been found in scan results.

arg.name: properties
arg.tp:docstring: A dictionary mapping property names to variant boxed values

tp:flags.name: NM_802_11_AP_FLAGS
tp:flags.tp:docstring: Flags describing the general capabilities of the access point.

tp:flag.tp:docstring: Null capability - says nothing about the access point.

tp:flags.name: NM_802_11_AP_SEC
tp:flags.tp:docstring: Flags describing the security capabilities of the access point.

tp:flag.tp:docstring: Access point supports pairwise 40-bit WEP encryption.
Access point supports pairwise 104-bit WEP encryption.
Access point supports pairwise TKIP encryption.
Access point supports pairwise CCMP encryption.
Access point supports a group 40-bit WEP cipher.
Access point supports a group 104-bit WEP cipher.
Access point supports a group TKIP cipher.
Access point supports a group CCMP cipher.
Access point supports PSK key management.
